name: KICK THEM OUT
description:
KICK THEM OUT

Try to survive as much you can by avoiding enemies using your "vertical" and "horizontal" inputs.

Your player's movement direction is based on your Camera angle view.

You can collect booster with an automatic usage all you have to do is SURVIVING!

Free Assets Used from Unity asset store :

  • FREE Stylized Textures - RPG Environment.
  • Aaron's Assets.
  • FREE Skybox Extended Shader.
  • 2D SKILLS ICON SET - HANDPAINTED.
  • FREE Stylized Textures - RPG Environment.
  • Game GUI Buttons.
  • Sweet Land GUI.

Paid Asset:

  • Sci-Fi Arsenal.
